title: Mike HR
author: Mike HR
content: Buying your crypto for USD / EURI offer:1. A wide range of transfer options available, such as Bank Transfer, PayPal, Wise, and more.2. Only verified escrow services3. 1 to 1 Exchange RateConditions for exchange:1. I do not accept Scam Tokens, Dark Market Tokens, or Mixer Tokens. I use AML (Anti-Money Laundering) scans.2. I'm not doing transfer first - we use escrow service3. Transfer fees or Escrow Service fees on your end.Selling other stablecoin / altcoins is discussed on an individual basisContact Telegram: @ethos4th

comments.author: BitSwapNow
comments.body: We offer an off ramp of 850+ cryptocurrency pairs via a multitude of fiat currencies. You could buy, sell or swap USDT or other stable coins instantly and cross chain or via EUR / USD like you are looking for.
